description: This table holds basic identification and processing information for the claim value record.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim values record.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: The date the record was created.

columns.name: CLM_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of claim values stored in the record. CMS is used for professional and dental claims. UB is used for institutional claims. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


CMS Claim


UB Claim


State Visit Data


State Visit Provider Data


Vektis Claim


Pharmacy Claim

columns.name: FORM_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of form used during processing. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Electronic Form


Paper Form


Both Paper and Electronic

columns.name: CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The direction of the claim file, either incoming or outgoing. This value is only set for Accounts Payable claims.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Incoming - Initial


Outgoing


Incoming - Repriced


Incoming - Canceled


Outgoing - External Pricing


Incoming - External Pricing


Incoming - Rejected

columns.name: AP_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The claim information record associated with the invoice. This value is only set for Accounts Payable claims.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The service area for the claim values record.

columns.name: HEALTH_SYS_IDENT
columns.description: This item holds the Health System Identifier (HSI) of the source for the claim.

columns.name: SOURCE_ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.description: The source organization of the external record. This value is only set for external claims.

columns.name: SOURCE_ORGANIZATION_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.
